title: Intro to Biomaterials
description: Introduction to different classes of biomaterials (polymers, metals, ceramics) and physiological responses to biomaterial implantation. Topics include material properties, host response, and biomaterial characterization techniques. Crosslisted with MSE 4751.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
